about_the_game:
Princess Marcela has been cursed and now she looks like a Donut! The only way to recover her natural human beauty is through Bogdan's alchemy skills. Her beloved knight is trying to use an old Alchemy book with different formulas, but he is not sure which one will restore Princess Marcela's beauty...

Desperate, Princess Marcela's father, the King, offered a prize to whom is able to fix his daughter and many snoopers started to invade Bogdan's land interested in that prize at any cost.

You play as the character Bogdan, running around your house eliminating the terrible snoopers.

Enjoy up to 10 levels where waves of snoopers are more and more difficult and will take you from the most casual player to the veteran.

If you want even more challenge try to play in Fury mode with an angry Bogdan running non-stop.
